item.title: "I'd Be The Happiest Person": Rian Johnson Gives Update On Making Another Star Wars Movie After Years Of Conflicting Reports
item.description: After many long years of conflicting reports and controversy, Rian Johnson has commented on the possibility of returning to the Star Wars franchise.

item.title: Dune Announces New Spin-Off Ahead of Its Movie Comeback, And It'll Be All About the Shai-Hulud
item.description: Ahead of Dune: Part Three, the franchise is working on a new spin-off that will put the Shai-Hulud center stage.

item.title: Every Final Destination Bloodlines Death, Ranked By How Improbable They Are
item.description: Final Destination Bloodlines features plenty of the franchise's signature elaborate and brutal deaths, with some more improbable than others.
